    Teaching


    Teaching Assistant, KTH Royal Institute of Technology

    August 2019 - October 2019

    Stockholm, Sweden

    Assisted lab sessions in ID2201 Distributed Systems, Basic Course for one study period. My attributions included hosting help sessions and grading student assignments. The course focuses on fundamental concepts in distributed systems, such as inter-process communication, synchronization, fault tolerance, and replication.
